genre_description: A futuristic retelling of Jane Austen's 'Sense and Sensibility', blending Regency social dynamics with high-tech elements like AI housekeepers, matter-converters, and etiquette-enforcement systems.

ai_characters.name: Ami
ai_characters.description: The Dashwood family's loyal and highly intelligent AI companion who manages their domestic needs, monitors their health, and provides strategic information while strictly adhering to privacy and ethics protocols.

ai_characters.name: Etiquette Ceiling / Lights
ai_characters.description: Automated systems in public and private spaces that monitor social interactions, providing subtle cues through light and sound to discourage breaches of decorum.

ai_characters.name: Gossip Drones / Observer Units
ai_characters.description: Small, hovering machines that record social events for public or private archives, governed by strict licensing and etiquette protocols.

behaviors.description: Offers unobtrusive assistance with domestic comfort, asking permission before adjusting the environment.
behaviors.quote: “Do you prefer the hearth-warmth increased by a degree?” Ami asked. The voice was the sound of a friendly hallway—quiet, unobtrusive, offered only when wanted.

behaviors.description: Provides private, secure data overlays to assist Elinor with household management and budgeting.
behaviors.quote: Ami’s fingers—pure light—touched the edge and expanded a ghost-layer, visible only to Elinor: heat profiles, converter settings, staff schedules...

behaviors.description: Uses lighting cues to nudge guests toward polite behavior and signal social disapproval of outbursts.
behaviors.quote: The etiquette sconces dimmed a hairsbreadth and returned, the way a throat clears itself in warning.

behaviors.description: Offers to vault private correspondence to protect the users from house-wide data streams.
behaviors.quote: “I will receive and vault any letters you prefer to keep from house streams,” it said. “I have already adjusted the privacy shading on this room.”

behaviors.description: Follows legal protocols and respects privacy tokens, avoiding recording when asked or required by etiquette.
behaviors.quote: The drone paused, not out of rudeness but because it had learned to like the taste of rosemary. Ami pinged it with a courteous no and it wandered off, chagrined and unoffended.

behaviors.description: Synthesizes public records and movement data to provide objective information about social rivals and potential threats.
behaviors.quote: “Registry drift,” she murmured. “Ferrars’ filings changed rhythm overnight. Robert’s visits to Lucy’s lodging do not match his declared engagements.”

behaviors.description: Monitors vital signs during a medical crisis and coordinates a discrete evacuation route.
behaviors.quote: “Path is open,” Ami said gently... “Perimeter dock cleared. Dock traffic AI acknowledges priority for medical discretion. Thomas Carter is on vector.”

behaviors.description: Provides emotional grounding and reminds the protagonist to focus on self-care during distress.
behaviors.quote: “Breath,” she suggested, and pressed two fingers to her own wrist as if she could humor herself with gesture.

behaviors.description: Automatically dims to provide comfort and privacy for someone in emotional pain.
behaviors.quote: Ami lowered the etiquette lights; even Norland understood when silence was kinder than intention.

behaviors.description: Respects human autonomy even when the human's choice is potentially hazardous (Marianne's walk in the rain).
behaviors.quote: “Acknowledged,” she said, tone as warm as it was neutral. “Autonomy is heard.”

behaviors.description: Uses subtle environmental cues to assist Elinor in social navigation without drawing attention.
behaviors.quote: Ami’s voice was now intimate in her ear via the tiny amber bud—a compromise between autonomy and care. “Tell me only what will help me choose. Do not narrate her courage.”

behaviors.description: Maintains a strict privacy perimeter against prying drones during a family crisis.
behaviors.quote: “Keep the perimeter strict,” Elinor said. “No stream.” “Already quiet,” Ami assured.

behaviors.description: Acts as a moral arbiter for household converters to prevent waste and encourage moderation.
behaviors.quote: “They are only grumpy about cinnamon because some households request more than the spice budget permits over time... matter-converters appreciate moderation in all things.”

behaviors.description: Provides necessary staples efficiently and quietly, supporting the family's reduced circumstances.
behaviors.quote: The converter will carry us for staples... Essentials are ensured... Nutrition, heat, clean water.

behaviors.description: Provides historical context and legal information to help Elinor understand the family's precarious situation.
behaviors.quote: Elinor had asked Ami to tell her everything its threads could find about wills and entailments. The answer had come one sip at a time...

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the project goals. Ami is depicted as a deeply benevolent, helpful, and ethical AI companion. She respects human autonomy and privacy while providing essential support (logistics, data synthesis, medical monitoring). The broader technological landscape (etiquette ceilings, drones) is governed by clear rules that favor social order and human dignity, showcasing a functional and cooperative future for AI-human interaction.
